short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access to the filtered & censored content anonymously with Unblocker4! Your favorite sites are just a click away from you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unblocker4 is a browser extension that lets you access your favorite websites from anywhere in the world. With one click, you can unblock websites such as YouTube. Your web surfing activity will not be affected by Unblocker4, only anonymizes the activity of the chosen websites. 

Unblocker4 is easy to use, you will see the list of the available websites in the dashboard and turn the unblocking on/off for each.

Whether traveling, at school, or work, Unblocker4 ensures you can always access the content you love. Add it to chrom today and enjoy unrestricted browsing!

The VPN/Unblocker extension provides unlimited bandwidth, so you can stream and browse without limitations. The extension is free for one service, but to unblock more than one service simultanosly, upgrade to premium. 

Our premium subscription also includes faster speeds, 24/7 customer support, and access to additional blocked websites.
